mapper.sql: id, tool_id, memory_id, total_uses, successful_uses, failed_uses, proficiency_level, total_practice_time, last_used_at, last_success_at, created_at, updated_at
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO tool_usage_stats ( tool_id, memory_id, total_uses, successful_uses, failed_uses, proficiency_level, total_practice_time, last_used_at, last_success_at, created_at, updated_at ) KEY (tool_id, memory_id) VALUES ( #{toolId}, #{memoryId}, #{totalUses}, #{successfulUses}, #{failedUses}, #{proficiencyLevel}, #{totalPracticeTime}, #{lastUsedAt}, #{lastSuccessAt}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE tool_usage_stats SET total_uses = #{totalUses}, successful_uses = #{successfulUses}, failed_uses = #{failedUses}, proficiency_level = #{proficiencyLevel}, total_practice_time = #{totalPracticeTime}, last_used_at = #{lastUsedAt}, last_success_at = #{lastSuccessAt}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE tool_id = #{toolId} AND memory_id = #{memoryId}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM tool_usage_stats WHERE memory_id = #{memoryId} ORDER BY proficiency_level DESC, total_uses DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE tool_usage_stats SET proficiency_level = #{proficiency}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE tool_id = #{toolId} AND memory_id = #{memoryId}
UPDATE tool_usage_stats SET total_practice_time = total_practice_time + #{additionalSeconds}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE tool_id = #{toolId} AND memory_id = #{memoryId}
